thread.title: Aurora Management Partners Hires Alex Boerema as Director for Chicago Office

author: cnbc.com
title: Aurora Management Partners Hires Alex Boerema as Director for Chicago Office
text:
Leader in turnaround and restructuring services hires Director to expand existing presence
CHICAGO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Aurora Management Partners is pleased to announce its recent hiring of Alex Boerema who joins Aurora’s team as Director; he will be based in Chicago. Within this role, Boerema will be responsible for spearheading and managing the firm’s existing presence in the Midwest, a strategic objective for a team well-recognized as one of the country’s most well-respected turnaround and restructuring consulting firms.
“I am looking forward to joining the Aurora team,” Boerema said. “And contributing in the firm’s continued success and growth within the Chicago and national marketplaces.”
Boerema comes to Aurora with ten years of strong industry experience and consulting expertise. He has led and been apart of mid-market to large market client engagements, which included debtor consulting, interim management consulting, crisis management, and operational improvement. Along with his professional experience, Alex currently holds leadership positions at the global and local chapter levels of the Turnaround Management Association.
“We are excited to have Alex join us and help us in expanding Aurora’s footprint in Chicago,” said David Baker, Managing Partner at Aurora.
Boerema’s history of success, timely, personal approach, and transparent commitment to delivering exceptional client service align well with Aurora’s brand not only today, but also as the firm continues to grow in service offerings and locations. With offices across the country in markets including Atlanta, Boston, Charlotte, and Cleveland, the organization’s expanded presence in Chicago will allow the firm to deliver more strategic solutions in one of the country’s most historically-prominent business climates and cultures.
Aurora Management Partners has grown to become one of the country’s most respected turnaround and restructuring consulting firms. The organization specializes in business consulting services, creditor services, investor services and corporate governance advisory services. The staff is capable of handling assignments from the simple and straightforward to those involving public or private companies facing multi-faceted and complex financial, operational, and strategic issues.
